attributes.action: STOP TRADING With the Faroes Isles as 1000,s of dolphins & whales are being kill
attributes.additional_details:
The U.K. government have blood on there hands, by importing fish from this dolphin whale killing country. 
It is illegal and immoral to kill cetaceans under U.K. &   E.U. law
attributes.background: STOP TRADING with Faroes. Sending a clear message to the world the U.K. will not accept or tolerate or be party to the horrific killing of dolphins and whales, not for any reason either scientific, tradition or religion.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about the killing of dolphins and whales, sanctioned by the Faroe Islands Government. However, decisions about who to trade with, and what for, within the law are commercial matters for individual customers and businesses, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could have a petition calling on the UK Government to work internationally to pressure the Faroe Islands Government to ban the killing of whales and dolphins, if that is something you'd like to see happen.
